mapper.insert: insert into product(p_name, p_price, p_sale, p_img1, p_img2, p_cnt, p_cate_idx, p_cate_name) values(#{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_sale}, #{p_img1}, #{p_img2}, #{p_cnt}, #{p_cate_idx}, #{p_cate_name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from product where p_name = #{p_name}
mapper.update: update product set p_name=#{p_name} p_price=#{p_price} p_sale=#{p_sale} p_img1=#{p_img1} p_cnt=#{p_cnt} p_cate_idx=#{p_cate_idx} p_cate_name=#{p_cate_name} where p_idx = #{p_idx};
